metadata.name: Exploit Framework User Agent
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious user agent strings used by exploit / pentest frameworks like Metasploit in proxy logs

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (startswith(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('internet explorer ')) OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 6.0; windows nt 5.1; sv1; infopath.2)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; metasploit rspec)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 6.1; windows nt)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 6.0; windows nt 5.1)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 7.0; windows nt 6.0)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 8.0; windows nt 6.0; trident/4.0)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; msie 7.0; windows nt 6.0; trident/4.0; simbar={7db0f6de-8de7-4841-9084-28fa914b0f2e}; slcc1; .n') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (compatible; googlebot/2.1; +http://www.google.com/bot.html)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (windows; u; windows nt 5.1; en-us) applewebkit/525.13 (khtml, like gecko) chrome/4.0.221.6 safari/525.13') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (compatible; msie 9.0; windows nt 6.1; wow64; trident/5.0; maau)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/4.0 (compatible; spipe/1.0') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 6.3; rv:39.0) gecko/20100101 firefox/35.0') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('sametime community agent') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('x-forwarded-for') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('dotdotpwn v2.1') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('sipdroid') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/5.0 (windows nt 10.0; win32; x32; rv:60.0)') OR lower(http_request.user_agent) = lower('mozilla/6.0 (x11; linux x86_64; rv:24.0) gecko/20140205     firefox/27.0 iceweasel/25.3.0') OR contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('wordpress hash grabber')) OR contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('exploit')))

output.summary: Detects suspicious user agent strings used by exploit / pentest frameworks like Metasploit in proxy logs

metadata.objective: Examine fields: ClientIP, http_request.url, http_request.user_agent False positive: Unknown Reference: https://blog.didierstevens.com/2015/03/16/quickpost-metasploit-user-agent-strings/
